author: Lukasz Okuniewicz <npm@okuniewicz.eu> (https://github.com/lukasz-okuniewicz)
description: A highly customizable particle system for PixiJS designed for performance and flexibility.
name: custom-pixi-particles

scripts.build: npm run clean-dist && tsc && node copy.js
scripts.build:browser:v6: npm install pixi.js-legacy@6.5.10 --no-save && npx esbuild dist/index.js --bundle --format=esm --outfile=dist/browser-bundle-v6.js --platform=browser --target=es2020 --sourcemap && npm install pixi.js-legacy@6.5.10 --no-save
scripts.build:browser:v7: npm install pixi.js@7.3.2 --no-save && npx esbuild dist/index.js --bundle --format=esm --outfile=dist/browser-bundle-v7.js --platform=browser --target=es2020 --sourcemap && npm install pixi.js@7.3.2 --no-save
scripts.build:browser:v8: npm install pixi.js@8.13.2 --no-save && npx esbuild dist/index.js --bundle --format=esm --outfile=dist/browser-bundle-v8.js --platform=browser --target=es2020 --sourcemap && npm install pixi.js@8.13.2 --no-save
